The thing is with Aiue Oka is that he never cucks his MCs, they do the cucking. Quite a surprise this one’s a normal looking guy. Lets just wait and see. But yeah, it looks like he’ll do some harem shit like the Bullied series.

@KindDick I don't think that your theory makes a big sense, coz NTR has never been the genre with a decently little logic. If his friends really wanted to NTR MC, he wouldn't give this book to him, he would just come to their house as a guest and would hypnotize his sexy siblings to NTR the main character.  It doesn't make much sense to let the MC enjoy the beauties at first to NTR him later. At least all NTR antagonists from NTR mangas usually don't act like this.
